title: How I Renovated a $15K Shower for $3K | DIY
description:
In this video I'm showing you how to build a customer shower from the studs out. I'm sharing details on every product and tool I used along the way, along with all the techniques you need to be successful. By DIYing this shower instead of hiring a contractor, I saved about $12K. Cheers!
